tool_description: Classifies traffic patterns from historical data into categories like rush hour, weekend, holiday, and seasonal patterns for predictive analysis.

historical_data.description: Historical traffic data values for pattern analysis

timestamps.description: Timestamps corresponding to historical data points

pattern_types.description: Pattern types to identify: daily, weekly, seasonal, holiday, event

minimum_pattern_length.description: Minimum number of data points required to identify a pattern

seasonal_adjust.description: Whether to apply seasonal adjustments to the data

outlier_removal.description: Whether to remove outliers before pattern classification

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence level for pattern classification (0.5-0.95)

max_patterns.description: Maximum number of distinct patterns to identify (5-50)

validation_split.description: Proportion of data to use for validation (0.1-0.3)

cross_validation_folds.description: Number of cross-validation folds for pattern validation (3-10)

error_messages: Insufficient data: historical_data and timestamps arrays must contain at least 100 elements each
Data length mismatch: historical_data and timestamps arrays must have the same length
Invalid timestamps: All timestamp values must be valid ISO 8601 format
Unsupported pattern type: pattern_types must contain only [daily, weekly, seasonal, holiday, event]
Unsupported classification method: Use one of [clustering, statistical, machine_learning]

Invalid parameter ranges: Check minimum_pattern_length >= 1, similarity_threshold in [0.1-0.9], confidence_threshold in [0.5-0.95], max_patterns in [5-50], validation_split in [0.1-0.3], cross_validation_folds in [3-10]
Pattern analysis failed: Unable to identify meaningful patterns in the provided data
usage: Provide historical_data and timestamps arrays with at least 100 data points each, optionally configure pattern detection parameters. Returns classified traffic patterns with confidence scores.

identified_patterns.description: Array of identified traffic pattern names

pattern_confidence.description: Confidence scores for each identified pattern

dominant_pattern.description: Most dominant traffic pattern in the dataset

pattern_coverage.description: Percentage of data explained by identified patterns

classification_accuracy.description: Overall classification accuracy score from 0 to 1
